downloadTitle: Project Server 2010 Demand Management Webcast Series slide presentations
downloadDescription: PowerPoint slides for the Microsoft Project Server 2010 Demand Management Webcast Series training videos.
detailsSection:
This download contains four Microsoft PowerPoint presentations for the Project Server 2010 Demand Management Webcast Series of training presentations. The presentations included in this download are:
  • Project Server 2010 - Demand Management Part 1
  • Project Server 2010 - Demand Management Part 2
  • Project Server 2010 - Demand Management Part 3
  • Project Server 2010 - Demand Management Part 4
The Project 2010 IT-Professional Webcast Series is a set of Project Server 2010 training videos presented by Microsoft product managers and architects that are targeted for the IT-Professional audience. These videos are available to view on-demand through the Microsoft Events and Webcast site. Download and use the corresponding slide presentations to assist in your understanding of the training videos. For a comprehensive description of each of the videos in the series, see the TechNet article Project Server 2010 Demand Management Webcast Series. For additional technical information referenced in the slides, see the Project Server 2010 TechCenter (TechNet) or Project 2010 How-to and Help. For more information about Project 2010, see the Project 2010 Web site.
systemRequirementsSection: To download and read this file, you must have Microsoft Office PowerPoint 2007 or PowerPoint Viewer 2007.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to transfer the compressed file to your computer. Decompress the file, then you can open the individual .pptx files.
